dcterms:creator: S. King
V. Karaiskos
dcterms:description: The Blizzard Challenge 2011 speech corpus contains around 12000 utterances read by a US professional female voice talent named Nancy, totaling approximately 16 hours of speech.
dcterms:title: Blizzard Challenge 2011 speech corpus

dcterms:creator: M. Cooke
C. Mayo
C. Valentini-Botinhao
dcterms:description: The Hurricane Challenge speech data consists of both normal and Lombard styles spoken by a British male voice professional named Nick, with 2592 utterances of normal speech (approximately 2 hours) and 720 utterances of Lombard speech (approximately 30 minutes).
dcterms:title: Hurricane Challenge speech data
